name: Unstable Pitch 24
description:
Gameplay:
Play as Russian Gopnik in this Weird Rhythm Game. You just bought an old boombox in your local convenience store for 300 rubles! There is no a better way to spend your night dancing to the weird beats that this unstable machine produces! Punch beer with your left and right legs!

Controls:
A - Left Punch
D - Right Punch

Historical reference:
Gopnik is a member of a subculture in Russia, a young man of working-class background who usually lives in suburban areas and comes from a family of poor education and income. There is a trend among gopniks to we wear sportswear and listen to hard and fast electronic music. 

Music by iceleaps: https://soundcloud.com/iceleaps
